content:
Hi Everyone,
I have an extensive knowledge of HL7 V2,V3 as an implementer and want to learn and understand FHIR from the scratch to Pro level. Can anyone please guide me?

Regards,
Hassan Ali
HL7 has wonderful courses to get you there. check them out at http://www.hl7.org/certification/fhir.cfm
If you're interested in the differences between v2 and v3 and FHIR, a high level overview of them is here: http://build.fhir.org/comparison.html
